about_the_game:
Montly Update: 9 new puzzles every month!

Insomnia Jigsaw is a relaxing puzzle game that will soothe you in just seconds : )

Visit some of the most beautiful sceneries in the world accompanied by calming piano and rain sounds, we will take care of all your stresses and sleepless nights.

36 unique puzzles with 4 levels of difficulty. Sleep mode for ultimate relaxation and timed mode for those seeking more challenges.

Drag the pieces to their position, form groups with them, use the shuffle button to arrange the pieces better.

Automatic puzzle snap with fulfilling sound for relaxation.

Features

  • 36 different puzzles
  • 9 unique beautiful sceneries
  • 4 levels of difficulty (6, 24, 54, and 96 pieces)
  • You can form groups with the pieces and combine them together
  • Autosave, you will not lose your progress
  • Relaxing music and atmosphere
